sentence.idiomatic: This movie is not as good as that one.
Your chest muscles aren't as strong as his.
You can't drink alcohol like he can.
Before I sweep the floor I always sprinkle a little water on it.
If you fill it with too much water it will spill easily.
He didn't hold still, and the milk in the glass all spilled out.
It's so dirty here, can you wipe it a bit?
The furniture here hasn't been used in a long time, you should first use a cloth and wipe it a bit.
He is a clean fanatic. Every day he wipes the floor clean.
It's getting late, I have to go.
I heard that it's going to be very cold tomorrow, you had better wear extra clothes.
You are really fat, you should lose weight.
Don't take off your shoes, your feet are too stinky.
Your clothing is all wet--quickly take it off.
He likes to sleep in the nude.
He regularly goes to the gym to work out.
She works out every day, no wonder she has such a great figure.
You don't have any chest muscles. Is it because you've not gone to the gym in a long time?
This dog's fur is so white and soft--touch it and see.
This kid is so cute. Every time I see her I have to touch her cheeks.
Your hand is too dirty, I forbid you to touch it.
She says you speak too nauseatingly.
This photo is so gross. Quick, delete it.
What flavor is this? It's so gross.
Losing this time doesn't matter, in the future there will be many more opportunities.
Failure is the mother of success.
Why do I always fail in love?
I bought quite a few DVDs for you. Pick which one you want to watch.
Let's watch this one.
OK. Here, have some popcorn.
This female lead is really beautiful.
Not as beautiful as you. Let's drink beer. Oops, look, I spilled on my clothes.
Use some paper and wipe it a bit.
No, I had better take it off.
Don't take it off.
This is so uncomfortable. I must take it off. Take a look, I work out every day. My chest is well built, you can have a touch.
Gross! Im leaving!
Dont leave. Arg, how did that not work again?
